ur_rna.StructureEditor.ui

Class DrawPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ur_rna.StructureEditor.ui.DrawPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ICanvas

    public class DrawPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ICanvas
    A double-buffered canvas on which the RNA scene can be drawn, implemented on top of a JPanel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
